name: ResearchSubjectMilestone
title: ResearchSubjectMilestone
description: Indicates the progression of a study subject through the study milestones.

concept.definition: A person has expressed an interest in being in a study but has not yet been through any assessment or consent processes.
A potential subject has been screened for suitability.
A subject has been allocated to an arm of the study.
